headline: Ask HN: Did Fourcc.org Get Taken Over?
description:
https://www.fourcc.org/ used to be very helpful for looking up codecs and pixel formats.

However, the site seems to have been taken over by what looks like the typical review/amazon linking spam sites you see when searching coding questions on google.

I wonder if the owner is not even aware that this happened!?

It seems to have happened sometime after Feb 2021 (https://web.archive.org/web/20210101000000*/https://www.fourcc.org/help.php).
description_zh-Hans:
https://www.fourcc.org/ 曾经对查找编解码器和像素格式非常有帮助。

然而，该网站似乎已经被看起来像典型的评论/amazon链接的垃圾网站接管，你在google上搜索编码问题时看到的。

我想知道所有者是否甚至不知道发生了这种情况！？

它似乎发生在2021年2月之后的某个时候（https://web.archive.org/web/20210101000000*/https://www.fourcc.org/help.php）。
description_zh-Hant:
https://www.fourcc.org/ 曾經對查找編解碼器和像素格式非常有幫助。

然而，該網站似乎已經被看起來像典型的評論/amazon鏈接的垃圾網站接管，你在google上搜索編碼問題時看到的。

我想知道所有者是否甚至不知道發生了這種情況！？

它似乎發生在2021年2月之後的某個時候（https://web.archive.org/web/20210101000000*/https://www.fourcc.org/help.php）。
